Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which we believe could significantly enhance the efficiency and profitability of your business operations. This product, tailored with cutting-edge technology and years of expertise, is priced at $15000. It's an investment that promises to pay dividends through improved performance and cost savings. We're confident it will meet or exceed your expectations. Please let us know if you have any questions or require further information. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
